articles.description: Former Google engineer James Damore, who was fired in August after posting a screed against the company's affirmative-action policies, sued Google Monday for discriminating against whites, males, and conservatives.
articles.title: James Damore's Lawsuit Is Designed to Embarrass Google
articles.author: Nitasha Tiku

articles.description: The Trump administration appears to be creating distance between itself and rumors that it might end the practice of extending H-1B visas during the green card application process. The rumored change would have a large impact on foreign tech workers in the U.…
articles.title: H-1B visa extensions for workers waiting on green cards are safe for now
articles.author: Taylor Hatmaker

articles.description: President Donald Trump bragged to the American Farm Bureau Association convention in Nashville, Tennessee on Monday that two new executive orders he’s signed will help solve the lingering problem of terrible rural broadband speeds. Read more...
articles.title: Donald Trump's Executive Orders on 'Great, Great' Rural Broadband Don't Really Do Anything

articles.title: Twitter Vows to Politely Ask Trump to Remove Tweets If He Doxes Journalists

articles.description: Back in September, JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon famously declared Bitcoin a “ fraud,” and the market for the cryptocurrency quickly dipped by eight percent. Then it recovered—by a lot. On Tuesday, Dimon said that he regrets the remark and he says “the block…
articles.title: Chase CEO Sheepishly Says He's Sorry for Being Mean to Bitcoin

articles.description: Anti-Trump lowbrowism burst into full bloom with the new Michael Wolff book.
articles.title: Op-Ed Columnist: The Decline of Anti-Trumpism

articles.description: Trevor Noah compared Oprah Winfrey with President Trump. “She’s everything that he’s not,” he said. “She’s black, she’s a woman, she likes to read.”
articles.title: Best of Late Night: Oprah 2020? Late Night Is Intrigued

articles.description: Immigrants and activists near the White House on Monday protested the Trump administration’s plan to end the Temporary Protected Status program for Salvadorans.
articles.title: A Counterproductive Approach to a Broken Immigration System
